patthana10.14:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana10.14:3.1_0: He doesn’t flail to the principle of streams, not totally. ...
patthana10.14:3.1_4: The hindrance of sensual desire, but not the hindrance of ill will ...
patthana10.14:3.1_5: He doesn’t completely understand the teachings of stream-entry, nor for the next life.
